game.name: EVE Online: Level 5 Mastery pack
game.genres: Action, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Trading Cards
game.shortDescription: 가장 높은 곳으로 날아오르기 위한 최고의 패키지입니다. 오메가 시간 6개월, 3,000 PLEX, 1,750,000 스킬 포인트로 뉴에덴의 정점에 오르세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ultimate resources for ultimate mastery. 6 months of Omega, 3,000 PLEX, and 1,750,000 SP to reach the pinnacle of training and power in New Eden.
